page.title: 14SERVICES IN THE AREA.
page.content: Both main villages have{electricity, {mains water}and{main sewage}but if you live out in the lanes you would need a{septic tank}for your waste water. If people want{gas}they would have to buy in bottles because there is no main gas. There isn't a{police {station}in either village but we do have a village policeman who lives in {Stoke-St.-Michael.}If there is a fire the fire engines would come from {Shepton Mallet.}In both villages people can get their papers, bread and milk delivered. A fish and chip van comes round on Saturdays and Thursdays. A{library van}comes from {Frome}because we haven't a library. The rubbish is collected once a week by a company called Cleanaway. The {post}is delivered once a day to houses but twice to our school.
